description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
Sutton's Hospital, The Charterhouse, 15 Charterhouse Square, Islington, London, EC1M 6AX

TPO Reference:
T14 – Mulberry of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994
T15 – Fig of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994
T20 – Mulberry of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994
T21 – Mulberry of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994
T22 – Fig of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994

PO Number:
T100008

Work specifications:

1 x Mulberry (T14) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994
Remove branch exhibiting die back 
Prune back to clear footpath and car park 
 
1 x Fig (T15) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994
Remove x1 large branch that encroaches on the adjacent building and prune remainder to give 1m clearance. Shorten the limb that grows acutely before reverting upright by up to 3m.
 
1 x Mulberry (T20) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994
Prune to favour more vigorous growth from adventitious shoots

1 x Mulberry (T21) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994
Reduce the low limb growing towards the car park to clear, prune to clear porters lodge by up to 2m

1 x Fig (T22) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.144) 1994
Prune to provide 1m clearance from buildings and light columns. Prune to raise crown 2.5m above ground level. Prune easterly stem to remove the 2-3m upright top section and shorten lateral limb by up to 3m.
